Luzbel::

Luzbel recived the com link of his master, but one Aerotaur's shot 
hit him and he fell inside the flames. But flames are Luzbel's 
element then just his pride was severy wounded... Luzbel took off 
again and face Aerotaur

"The bell saved you, whoever you're" said Luzbel with fury "The top-
dragon needs me in other place and it force me to give you the 
victory" and added with a devil tone "You won the first round but 
live awared and keep an eye in you and your friends... you don't know 
how and when I'll take my revange..."

The Dragon transformed in beast mode and flew where his master was.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He springs to his feet and dashes into the woods where the 
trees will 
> protect him from the fire.  At least the direct blasts.  From the 
cover of a 
> shrub he takes to the air and hovers above Luzbel.  He fires four 
shots from 
> each arm cannon.
